devdoc.details: Only for upgradeability testing purposes. Extends UpgraderUUPSTemplate so that it can upgrade, via UUPS, the original Moc CA implementation

execute().details: Should be called by the governor, but this contract does not check that explicitly because it is not its responsibility in the current architecture IMPORTANT: This function should not be overridden, you should only redefine _beforeUpgrade and _afterUpgrade methods to use this template

devdoc.title: MocUpgradeChangerMock
